forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. High 6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 29F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 5C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 41F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 6C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 42F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain with some snow mixing in late. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. Then remaining overcast in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning. Remaining cloudy in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later at night. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later at night. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. High around 40F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
